title: New American Bible: Revised Edition (retail epub, mobi)
description:
New American Bible: Revised Edition (Fireside Personal Study Edition), 2012.

Epub and mobi files from a retail source.


The Bible text is that of teh most recent edition of the New American Bible, which is more or less the "official" English-language Bible for Catholics in the USA.

publisher description:

Complete Old and New Testament in the New American Bible Revised Edition text (NABRE); approved and sponsored by the United States Conference of Catholic Bishops.
Includes: Footnotes and Cross-references to the Scripture text; The Dogmatic Constitution on Divine Revelation; Origin, Inspiration and History of the Bible; THE BIBLE: A Catholic Perspective; Three Year Cycle of Readings for weekdays, Sundays and Feast Days; A Catholic Encyclopedic Dictionary with more than 2,000 entries, Maps of the Holy Land; Celebration of the Eucharist and more.


----

Many thanks to the original uploader.
